member.name: T:System.Text.CodePagesEncodingProvider
member.summary: Provides access to an encoding provider for code pages that otherwise are available only in the desktop .NET Framework.

member.name: M:System.Text.CodePagesEncodingProvider.GetEncoding(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the encoding associated with the specified code page identifier.
member.param: The code page identifier of the preferred encoding which the encoding provider may support.
member.returns: The encoding associated with the specified code page identifier, or if the provider does not support the requested codepage encoding.

member.name: M:System.Text.CodePagesEncodingProvider.GetEncoding(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the encoding associated with the specified code page name.
member.param: The code page name of the preferred encoding which the encoding provider may support.
member.returns: The encoding associated with the specified code page, or if the provider does not support the requested encoding.

member.name: M:System.Text.CodePagesEncodingProvider.GetEncodings
member.summary: Returns an array that contains all the encodings that are supported by the .
member.returns: An array that contains all the supported encodings.

member.name: P:System.Text.CodePagesEncodingProvider.Instance
member.summary: Gets an encoding provider for code pages supported in the desktop .NET Framework but not in the current .NET Framework platform.
member.returns: An encoding provider that allows access to encodings not supported on the current .NET Framework platform.
